creator: justapps
descriptionHtml:
An attractive Instagram profile is not only made with a few posts, videos and highlights. It needs more decoration, unique decoration. If you're having an Instagram profile with dozens of highlight stories without any cover, then we have to say your profile does looks a bit creepy. To get rid of this, you could add beautiful covers to your highlights and make it more attractive. Now the question is where to find a perfect highlight cover creator for Instagram? Well, this app is an answer! We have created a free highlight maker for your Instagram highlights. That allows you to make a color story, story arts with help of floral, colors and marble designs.

What's Inside:

Easy Customization: StoryLight Highlight Cover maker lets you customize all templates easily. Just tap on colors, borders, icons, stickers, texts to enlarge them or edit them.

Highlight Backgrounds: An app dedicated to highlighting your Instagram account. Create beautiful covers for highlights of Instagram. There are different backgrounds, colors, floral and marble designs to choose from.

Borders: Add a border to your IG highlight cover to make it more beautiful. There are dozens of highlight borders which you can use. Adding them is easy,

Icons & Stickers: A package of cool icons that you can add to your highlight cover. It has emojis, floral icons, food icons pack and also love icons. (+ Many More on the way).

Add Text: StoryLight Highlight App for Instagram is a kind of Instagram story editor that also allows you to add text with beautiful fonts to your Instagram highlight cover.

For Influencers: Influencers always need something attractive to gain more followers and get more leads. A good highlight cover can easily get you more profit in your business. So, try the app today.

& more features to be added soon with new updates. Install today!

title: Highlight Cover Maker for IG

descriptionHtml:

An attractive Insta profile is not only made with a few posts, videos, and highlights. It needs more decoration, unique decoration. If you have an Insta profile with dozens of highlight stories without any cover, then we have to say your profile looks a bit creepy. To get rid of this, you could add beautiful covers to your highlights and make them more attractive. Now the question is, where to find a perfect highlight cover creator for Insta? Well, this app is an answer! We have created a free highlight maker for your Insta highlights. Make your Insta profile stand out with a beautiful highlight cover creator with aesthetic designs.

For Influencers: Influencers always need something attractive to gain more followers and get more leads. A good highlight cover can quickly get you more profit in your business. So, try the Highlight Cover Maker for Insta today!

Decorate your IG profile and stand out from the crowd! ✨✨✨✨✨
